subject: docs: update documentation accuracy across project files
body:
- README.md: Fix tone count (35 → 37), tutorial step count (8 → 9)
- CLAUDE.md: Remove non-existent ToneComparison.tsx reference
- CLAUDE.md: Remove references to non-existent SESSION_NOTES.md, CALCULATIONS.md, BUSINESS_GUIDE.md
- CLAUDE.md: Add missing USER_ACTIONS.md to project structure
- DATABASE.md: Complete rewrite with actual schema (app_instances, chats, messages, reactions, etc.)
  - Previous version incorrectly documented a profiles table that doesn't exist
title: update documentation accuracy across project files
